No complaining please, you can't mess up on downloading this. The up-loader did a magnificent job. I'm currently playing it daily. My final cut:

Pros:
~Simple setup; just download and install
~Amazing quality; no lagging or off sequenced audio.
~No viruses; a clean upload of both games.

Cons:
~ Cinematic scenes are not messed up, the audio is there but the screen is black but you can still understand the story because of the other scenes. 

For people complaining about multiplayer or Kaspersky virus detection:

You cannot run a cracked game on the developers servers unless you have a key. It's that simple, so don't try it. However you can use a "private" server. Eurobattle.net, sign up then install the server and start it up. You can find video tutorials on YouTube if you're really too stupid to figure it out (in which case you shouldn't be trying to pirate things).
Next; Kaspersky is shit, it isn't a good software, even if everyone uses it. Download Avira and perform scans before and after you download something if you don't know how to find viruses yourself manually.

To everyone saying that Battle.net is NOT WORKING :

To play on a legit battle.net servers (USEast, USWest, Europe), you need an authentic CD-Key that only comes when you buy the game. They are all registered in Blizzard's database that no one can crack. You might buy one online but beware from scammers who might not sell legit CD-Keys.

nvm i found a way to patch it. just do something like this but for the patch you want:

How to make Warcraft 3 Registry Entries:

1. Open up regedit (start > run > regedit)
2. Go to HKEY_CURRENT_USER\SOFTWARE\Blizzard Entertainment\
3. Create new key, name it 'Warcraft III' (without quotes)
4. On right side of new key entry, right click and create new string value
5. Name it 'InstallPath' (without quotes)
6. Change the value of InstallPath to wherever you installed it (example: 'c:\warcraft 3\')
7. Reinstall Warcraft 1.24d Patch. (this time your war3 will be installed without any errors)
8. Enjoy! your Warcraft is patched to 1.25b

To patch, download the latest patch from here: http://us.battle.net/support/en/article/warcraft-iii-patch-downloads

If it fails, check the error message. In Linux, I had a problem with registry where the key "Warcraft III/InstallPath" was not set. Simply setting the registry key to the correct folder fixed the problem.

Jag är emellertid lite orolig kring det här med virus och trojaner. Visst, spontant verkar det rent, men jag snappade upp filen "supportconfig.exe" som lustigt nog krokar fast sig under Autostart (se msconfig.exe). En check av den här filen på eg. virustotal.com ger inget utslag (förutom på en eller två mindre tillförlitliga AV-program), men det känns ändå lite weird att den slår rot under Autostart. Kollade lite egenskaper för denna exekverbara fil och den _ser ut_ (ger sig tillkänna som*) : SVN Version:6356 2010/04/12 09:52:30 Eric av Garena. Men hur står det egentligen till? Och återigen, varför krokar den fast i Autostart? Någon som är _rejält insatt_ och/eller vet?

Also speeds not bad.

How to play via LAN. Turn off windows firewall. From main menu: click "local area network", click "create game" select a map that allows as many players as you want in the game including computer opponents, click create game, select open for each human player you want. Wait for other people on the lan to join the game. When everyone is ready, click "start game".

This is the way that it worked to me with the latest 1.26a patch:
1 - When you are installing the game, rename the installation folder path just like "warcraft III"
   - E.g. C:Warcraft III
2 - Download and apply this fix, both  http://www.engamers.com/download-warcraft-iii-fixer-w3fixer/
2 - Open regedit (press windows key + R and type regedit)
   - Go to HKEY_CURRENT_USERSOFTWAREBlizzard EntertainmentWarcraft III
   -  On right side, right click on the string value named "InstallPath" (if does not exist, create it) >Modify>  set the value data just like you did on the 1st step.
   -  Download and install the latest patch without any problems http://us.battle.net/support/en/article/warcraft-iii-patch-downloads
